title: Tassel, 17th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: braided and knotted
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Tiny linen tassel, braided and knotted. Braided loop and stem attached to center ball to which are attached six units made of small knots (including center).

tombstone.epitaph:
Tassel, 17th century.Medium: linen
Technique: braided and knotted. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-51-11.
